1.12.2.0.0.6a:
Editor gui cleanup
Added custom Animations tab in editor
Variuos rendering fixes with the editor
1.12.2.0.0.7a:
Fixed models not loading from skins.
Player heads now show proper model (1.15+).
Fixed editor not loading player part rotations.
1.12.2.0.0.8a:
Added skull rendering to 1.7.10-1.12.2
Fixed crash with export menu.
Fixed Undo and Redo keyboard shortcuts not working on some keyboards.
1.12.2.0.0.8b:
Fixed skin lighting with optifine shaders
Fixed armor layers not rotating with custom animations.
1.12.2.0.0.8c:
Fixed editor crash with optifine
Fixed crash on startup on 1.8 and 1.12.2
1.12.2.0.0.9a:
Added Templates!

New features:
Duplicate parts (Closes #27)
Color picker saves last 6 colors for quick access (Closes #24)
Open Editor button on the Title Screen can be disabled in the config (Closes #25)
Added Global animation pose
Animations with the same name will all play
Added an animation priority

Bug fixes:
Fixed rotation in animations
Fixed Animation frame delete button (Closes #31)
Fixed exporter breaking with more than 128 parts (Closes #30)
Fixed export fail with animations (Closes #28, Closes #20, #29)
Fixed editor crash in 1.15 (Closes #22)
Fixed crash with custom skin loader (Closes #21)
Fixed looping gestures not saving properly
1.12.2.0.0.9b:
New features:
Config screen in Editor (Edit/Settings)
Change rotation mouse button in Editor
Zoom with +, - keys in editor

Bug fixes:
Fixed texture editor drawing (Closes #33)
Fixed CustomSkinLoader crash (Closes #34)
Player head no longer renders if wearing a player head
1.12.2.0.0.10a:
New features:
Root parts can be duplicated (#29, #38)
Animation frame data is copied from selected frame to new frame (Closes #42)

Fixed config not saving (Closes #36)
Fixed slim model not converting properly (Closes #41).
1.12.2.0.0.10b:
Fixed crash with 1.7.10 and 1.8.9
Fixed hand rendering not working
Fixed duplicated parts animations not working
1.12.2.0.0.10c:
Fixed animations displaying incorrectly in the editor (Closes #44)
Fixed editor crash on 1.7.10-1.12.2 (Closes #45)
Fixed animations not displaying correctly on 1.7.10-1.12.2 (Closes #43)
Added glowing effect to 1.7.10-1.12.2 (Closes #46)
Fixed custom skins not rendering on server NPC-s.
1.12.2.0.0.10d:
Fixed crash on multiplayer servers (Closes #51)
Fixed crash with player heads when using Optifine
1.12.2.0.0.11a:
New features:
Added local models gui, accessible from Editor/Edit/Models or Gesture menu/Models
Models gui can change skin when the mod is installed on the server.
Added Test Ingame button to editor. (Closes #50)

Fixed animations broken when holding your own player head (Closes #54, Closes #59)
Fixed editor can't draw when texture size is larger than 1. (Closes #56)
1.12.2.0.0.11b:
Added: Animations can be edited. (Closes #58)
Improved model loading speed.
Fixed Test Ingame button not working in any version other than 1.16.5 forge
1.12.2.0.0.12a:
Added: display held item in the editor.
Added: player model scaling with Pehkui mod on 1.16 versions
Added: change gui scale for the editor independently from game gui scale
Added: scroll bars now show on scrollable elements and can be dragged
Added: drag UVs in texture tab

Fixed skins not loading correctly on Fabric 1.16 (Closes #57)
Fixed checking incorrect vanilla skin size (#63)
Fixed flying animation not displaying correctly in editor
Fixed log spam with skin loading
Fixed vanilla skin not always loading in editor
Fixed Test Ingame not working correctly (Closes #65, ? #67)
Rewritten networking
Fixed models not rendering correctly
Fixed models gui not displaying correctly on certain resolutions
Fixed keybinds not working properly on fabric (Closes #68)
Fixed editing animation types not working (#67)
Fixed various editor gui bugs
1.12.2.0.0.12b:
Fixed editor crash (Closes #71)
Fixed log spam with skin loading
Fixed hand and skull not rendering properly in some cases (Closes #73)
1.12.2.0.0.13a:
Added: Skin changer

Model files don't need gists if not skin compatible (Closes #75)
Fixed exporter crashing with certain models (Closes #77)
Fixed loading freeze on certain systems (#60)
Fixed crash with servers (Closes #74)
Fixed model changer not working on 1.12.2
Fixed walking animation not displaying for other players (Closes #78)
1.12.2.0.0.13b:
Fixed fabric mod not loading on server (Closes #80)
Fixed gestures gui not using the correct model data in some cases
1.12.2.0.0.14a:
Server-side models are saved inside world/data/cpm.json
Added clear button to animations editor to remove part from current animation frame. (Closes #81)
Added editor auto-saves project event 5 minutes
Added more keyboard shortcuts to editor Ctrl+S, Tab to switch text fields
Added fill UV option
Added bucket fill option for texture editor
Added scrollable model elements tree

Fixed animation visibility not exporting correctly (Closes #85)
Fixed using the drag UV tool not undoable
Fixed armor rendering in 1.12.2 (Closes #86)
Fixed moving multiple elements not working
Fixed exporter not exporting blockbench converted project.

Added skull rendering to 1.7.10-1.12.2
Fixed crash with export menu.
Fixed Undo and Redo keyboard shortcuts not working on some keyboards.
1.17-fabric.0.0.8b:
Fixed text not rendering properly
Fixed crash with 21w06a
1.17-fabric.0.0.8c:
Fixed skin lighting with optifine shaders
Fixed armor layers not rotating with custom animations.
1.17-fabric.0.0.8d:
Fixed editor crash with optifine
Fixed crash on startup on 1.8 and 1.12.2
1.17-fabric.0.0.9a:
Added Templates!

New features:
Duplicate parts (Closes #27)
Color picker saves last 6 colors for quick access (Closes #24)
Open Editor button on the Title Screen can be disabled in the config (Closes #25)
Added Global animation pose
Animations with the same name will all play
Added an animation priority

Bug fixes:
Fixed rotation in animations
Fixed Animation frame delete button (Closes #31)
Fixed exporter breaking with more than 128 parts (Closes #30)
Fixed export fail with animations (Closes #28, Closes #20, #29)
Fixed editor crash in 1.15 (Closes #22)
Fixed crash with custom skin loader (Closes #21)
Fixed looping gestures not saving properly
1.17-fabric.0.0.9b:
New features:
Config screen in Editor (Edit/Settings)
Change rotation mouse button in Editor
Zoom with +, - keys in editor

Bug fixes:
Fixed texture editor drawing (Closes #33)
Fixed CustomSkinLoader crash (Closes #34)
Player head no longer renders if wearing a player head
1.17-fabric.0.0.10a:
New features:
Root parts can be duplicated (#29, #38)
Animation frame data is copied from selected frame to new frame (Closes #42)

Fixed config not saving (Closes #36)
Fixed slim model not converting properly (Closes #41).

Fixed crash with 1.7.10 and 1.8.9
Fixed hand rendering not working

Fixed crash on multiplayer servers (Closes #51)

1.17-fabric.0.0.11a:
New features:
Added local models gui, accessible from Editor/Edit/Models or Gesture menu/Models
Models gui can change skin when the mod is installed on the server.

Fixed animations broken when holding your own player head (Closes #54, Closes #59)
Fixed editor can't draw when texture size is larger than 1. (Closes #56)

Added: Animations can be edited. (Closes #58)
Improved model loading speed.
Fixed Test Ingame button not working in any version other than 1.16.5 forge
1.17-fabric.0.0.12a:
Added: display held item in the editor.
Added: player model scaling with Pehkui mod on 1.16 versions
Added: change gui scale for the editor independently from game gui scale
Added: scroll bars now show on scrollable elements and can be dragged
Added: drag UVs in texture tab

Fixed skins not loading correctly on Fabric 1.16 (Closes #57)
Fixed checking incorrect vanilla skin size (#63)
Fixed flying animation not displaying correctly in editor
Fixed log spam with skin loading
Fixed vanilla skin not always loading in editor
Fixed Test Ingame not working correctly (Closes #65, ? #67)
Rewritten networking
Fixed models not rendering correctly
Fixed models gui not displaying correctly on certain resolutions
Fixed keybinds not working properly on fabric (Closes #68)
Fixed editing animation types not working (#67)
Fixed various editor gui bugs
1.17-fabric.0.0.12b:
Fixed editor crash (Closes #71)
Fixed log spam with skin loading
Fixed hand and skull not rendering properly in some cases (Closes #73)
1.17-fabric.0.0.13a:
Added: Skin changer

Model files don't need gists if not skin compatible (Closes #75)
Fixed exporter crashing with certain models (Closes #77)
Fixed loading freeze on certain systems (#60)
Fixed crash with servers (Closes #74)
Fixed model changer not working on 1.12.2
Fixed walking animation not displaying for other players (Closes #78)
1.17-fabric.0.0.13b:
Fixed fabric mod not loading on server (Closes #80)
Fixed gestures gui not using the correct model data in some cases
1.17-fabric.0.0.14a:
Server-side models are saved inside world/data/cpm.json
Added clear button to animations editor to remove part from current animation frame. (Closes #81)
Added editor auto-saves project event 5 minutes
Added more keyboard shortcuts to editor Ctrl+S, Tab to switch text fields
Added fill UV option
Added bucket fill option for texture editor
Added scrollable model elements tree

Fixed animation visibility not exporting correctly (Closes #85)
Fixed using the drag UV tool not undoable
Fixed armor rendering in 1.12.2 (Closes #86)
Fixed moving multiple elements not working
Fixed exporter not exporting blockbench converted project.
